title: Pixel 3 drains battery, charges slowly, USB problems, heats up
content:
My pixel 3 started acting very strange for no apparent reason: 
The USB port stopped working with many devices (earphones, some chargers)
The battery drains super quick
The phone charges very slowly, no matter what charger I use
The phone really heats up for no apparent reason
Any thoughts as to why can something like this happen and how may it be solved? I'm very close to giving up and changing a phone...
